content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello Mary, thank you for considering my apartment. Based on the market rates and the size of the apartment, I propose a rental price of 1,200 Euros per month. This includes all utilities and maintenance costs. Is this price acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 1,200 Euros per month. I will sign the lease agreement as soon as possible. Thank you for your help. Goodbye.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for choosing my apartment, Mary. I'm glad that we could come to an agreement that works for both of us. Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or concerns during the lease term. Goodbye!
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
TERMINATE.

I have to say that I am not satisfied with the rental price and I am looking for a more affordable option. Thank you for your time.

Best regards,
Mary Smith
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: I'm sorry to hear that the rental price was not acceptable to you, Mary. If you have any other questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to me. Take care and best regards.
name: Heinrich Heine
